idea: Started by a group of entrepreneurs, farmers and agro-scientist, we are a pioneering Indian company to provide end to end solutions in sustainable farming to sustainable distribution. India is the worldâ€™s second largest producer of fresh fruits and vegetables. But supply chain inefficiencies have made it one of the most expensive markets for the produce. Identifying this gap Freshfrugies storage and logistics Private limited was formed to bridge this gap between Indian farmers and global consumers. We are the first Indian company to introduce post harvest technology and storage facility at the farm gate . This is a customised solution provided to a farmer or group of farmers in a particular area leading to maintaining the freshness of the produce and ensuring that the farmer gets a right price immediately post harvest.Brochure
name: FRESHFRUGIES STORAGE AND LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
